Verses: 1 en Nerukkaththile Karththarai Nokki Kooppitten; Avar Enakku Sevikoduththaar.
2 karththaave, Poi Udhadugalukkum Kapadanaavukkum En Aaththumaavai Thappuviyum.
3 kapadanaave, Unakku Enna Kidaikkum? Unakku Enna Seyyappadum?
4 balavaanudaiya Koormaiyaana Ambugalum, Sooraichedigalai Erikkum Thazhalume Kidaikkum.
5 aiyo! Naan Mesekkile Sanjariththadhu Podhum, Kedhaarin Koodaarangalandaiyile Kudiyirundhadhum Podhum!
6 samaadhaanaththai Pagaikkiravargalidaththil En Aaththumaa Kudiyirundhadhum Podhum!
7 naan Samaadhaanaththai Naadugiren; Avargalo, Naan Pesumpodhu Yuththaththukku Eththanappadugiraargal.
